title: Easy Chili III
directions: In a large pot over medium heat, cook beef, onion and garlic until meat is brown.  Stir in black beans, kidney beans, pinto beans, tomatoes, tomato paste and tomato sauce.  Season with chili powder, salt, pepper and pepper sauce.  Reduce heat, cover and simmer 2 to 3 hours, until beans are tender.
ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, peeled and chopped
2 tablespoons chili powder, or to taste
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste
